48
THE MANNER OF INCLUDING A GIFT OR LEGACY
(1) Gifts and legacies shall be included in such a manner that the other heirs are given an appropriate value from the estate and only then shall the rest of the estate be divided among all the heirs.
(2) When the property in the possession of the decedent at the time of his or her death is insufficient for other heirs to obtain an appropriate value, the heir whose gifts and legacies are included in his or her hereditary portion shall not be obliged to give up something he or she has been given.
(3) The provisions applying to the statutory portion shall remain valid in such cases.
